5. Every director shall be exempt from the payment of the rates
specified in the Schedule in respect of-
     (a) lodging for a period of two weeks in each year;

provisions.title: Section 6
provisions.content:
6. The following persons shall be exempt from the payment of
the rates specified in the Schedule in respect of the use of the baths-
     (a) the postmistress of the Bath Post Office;
     (b) Mr. J. A. Halliburton;
     (c) Mr. I. Johnson;
     (6) any person who is, in the opinion of the clerk, in destitute
         circumstances.
